website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality wall decal that comes to life when paired with the included phone app.
pros: Use the free phone app to make your wall decal come to life in animated form
Easy to apply, even for kids
Peel and remove without leaving a residue or causing damage
Various Marvel characters are also available
cons: Some characters are smaller than others

customer_reviews.title: Awesome prodcut!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking and high quality image! The addition of the augment reality using the app is amazing, and always gets a cool response from guests that I show it to. Great product, and plan to order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and remove. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly (thank you amazon prime), easy to apply and remove/reapply if you don’t get it straight the first time. My son absolutely loves it. There is an app that is designed to go with the decal, you scan spidey and an animated Spider-Man pops up, which is an added bonus. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Walton

customer_reviews.title: High detail but small compared to other super heroes
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sticker but he's really small compared to all the other super heroes and this is the biggest black panther. But he is posing so it look normal
customer_reviews.author: Terik

customer_reviews.title: Hulk smash!
customer_reviews.text: Orderedthese for my little boys’ super hero room. They were so excited to hang them up. I love that they won’t damage the paint or walls, yet still are fun, bright and colorful. Application was easy. I am looking to purchase more to complete the superhero theme👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Frehner

customer_reviews.title: Great decal!
customer_reviews.text: Put Groot on my bottom refrigerator door with the cassette decal and it looks great. Got a few compliments already. If I'm having an off day I just look into the kitchen and see Groot chilling out on the fridge as a reminder to throw on some old classic tunes and relax :-) I'm Groot!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Kids love!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so did my daughter but I hated trying to match his body together to make it look like spider man. So mines a little off but still great!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Decal was perfect coming out of the box. The size was just great for the amount of wall I wanted to cover. The bonus decals are excellent. And the graphics when using the phone to bring the characters to life are my son’s favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Really nice stickers
customer_reviews.text: Great sticker fun for my grandson’s new Avenger/captain America room. he placed them where HE wanted them. large and small stickers that were easy to place and remove.
customer_reviews.author: shagler

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. i was disappointed though when i was taking it off the paper and it ripped, especially because i was barley pulling. luckily it was to bad that i could just put it back together. but other than that it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Harry B.

customer_reviews.title: Decal put together is not seamless.
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I would have liked for this decal to be a little bigger to fill out the wall more. Application was easy. We literally just stuck it on and went about our day. Downside - his limbs don’t line up well. We made it work and you can’t tell the lines are off unless you’re tall enough to put your face up close. Otherwise our 2 year old is ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Craven

customer_reviews.title: Great For Boys Room!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 9 year old grandson and he absolutely loved it! I had to move it around while trying to get it straight and had no trouble with the decal coming off the wall or going back onto the wall. I often worry about a sticky adhesive however that was not the case with this decal. Great decor for a boys room!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Look good! Like picture
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It didn’t take long to put it up. Sticks well and easy to remove to place elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shanietria Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for hulk fans
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Vibrant colors but sadly smaller than I was expecting, make sure you look at the measurements not giant at all.
customer_reviews.author: LL0922

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Turned out perfect. Had to adjust after I stuck it the first time so he wasn't on his side and re-stuck without any trouble. Bubbles weren't even a problem or any tearing. Worked great, and my 8 year old son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary P

customer_reviews.title: Nice restickable wall decals
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wall decals! My 5 year old lives them. They're decent size and have pretty good reusable adhesive. The extral logos and symbols included are cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son love this. They were so good I ended up ordering 3 more characters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item not in bag! I received an empty bag...
customer_reviews.text: I think I’d really love my product...if I received it! I got a big bag of...air. No product. First experience with this but as this is a birthday gift for my son, I’m not taking it well. How do I get my product?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great when it’s done perfectly but they need to cut it differently.
customer_reviews.text: The decal is really cool but the way they cut His right leg makes it’s extremely hard to properly align the decal. I’m somewhat of a perfectionist with this sort of thing. The hulk was very easy and I had no issues. But the Spider-Man should have been cut very differently. If you’re the type of person that wants the pieces to align perfectly, I’d stay away from the Spider-Man.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As described and very easy to install. Happy customer. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyne  Omboto

customer_reviews.title: Hulk
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Has stayed on very well. The little 3D app is neat.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, come with a bunch of great "extra sticker"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's bedroom. It was really easy to assemble and the adhesion is great, but you are easily able to remove and stick again, compared to other decals I have used in the past. I also liked that it came with additional spiderman decals.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s birthday. Then he found my hiding place! 😂 He loves it! I’m so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move to another spot if you change your mind. Great size and realistic looking. My sons love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Great for a little boy to have in his room. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Has remained on the wall without any peeling or problems.
customer_reviews.author: good game

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year olds dream!!
customer_reviews.text: My four -year-old son is obsessed with the Incredible Hulk. I bought the stickers as a birthday present for him and he absolutely love them. We put them up all over his room last night and had a blast. Great product and definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley I

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these wall decals! The quality is great and the they are so easy to put on! He is obsessed with superhero’s and his room is filled with all the characters. I thought it would be too much on the walls but they all look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lukekane913

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my nephew he loved it. We put it up together. Easy to put up. Nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong parts in my package!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I spent $17 for this wall sticker only to receive it and go to put it on my sons wall to realize I got 2 of the same legs so I can’t even finish the Spider-Man or return it cuz I already stuck it to my wall!!! And there is no way to get ahold of someone to send me the other leg!!!!
customer_reviews.author: elmer johns jr

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Especially with the apps
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to deliver but the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P Auguste

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wall decal!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and super easy to put up. Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so does my 6yo
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My son loves it and so do I. :) It's pretty big for a small price. Would buy Spiderman one too.
customer_reviews.author: Tanik

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even say I am Groot. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh, sticky stuff is cool but the app part is wack. All Groot does is a weird dance to a even more weird song. He doesn’t even say I am Groot! They must not have gotten the rights for his voice? Because that made my 3 year old son so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DeCicco

customer_reviews.title: Super!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Going to buy more when it can ship to Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fritschie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Not too big not too small. Son loved it

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old Grandson was able to remove and apply the sticker!

customer_reviews.title: no Complaints
customer_reviews.text: spider man looks real, and is great material, can peel off and put on easy

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: It sticks very well. Doesn’t matter what type of wall you have

customer_reviews.title: I love the Hulk
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my door at work...don't ask :-). I love it!

customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my sons super hero room!! He loves it and it looks amazing!!!

customer_reviews.title: Made a splash with my grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his city hall as he calls it with all his Super Heroes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we ordered and needed.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! I was nervous about lining up each piece but from far away you can’t even tell. We also added a “web” coming from Spider-Man’s hand!

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves his hulk pillow and blanket so I bought him this, he loves it. It's such good quality. Once we move here soon I'll get him more of these

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Spiderman came in 4 parts and had to match and align to make one single piece. Super easy to do and is easy to remove and restick.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hulk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome decal! Easy to put together, and I have moved it a few times. It stays every time.

customer_reviews.title: great decal, but missing part.
customer_reviews.text: missing other half of decal. Have 2 of the same body part.

customer_reviews.title: My son is in love

customer_reviews.title: Be leary
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Followed instructions and it tore up. Na hy be got a defective one. Would like to get a new one for my son as he was disappointed -Never heard anything from the seller

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: For one the decal is in many pieces and the pieces dont even align with the other. This product is just simply not made for satisfaction.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Buy this item you won't be disappointed. The color is great, as well as the demensions. Adheres well and looks great.

customer_reviews.text: Looks like one complete piece when placed correctly - really looks awesome on wall!

customer_reviews.text: I love the transparent background on the stickers. Some others have white backgrounds which makes it not as cool. It could be just a tad bit bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Cool decal.
customer_reviews.text: Fun item. Comes in 3 pieces with instructions how to assemble. It’s not a no-brainer strangely enough. Stuck without a problem on the wall. Easily removes leaving no traces.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece after assembly the parts. Easy to apply. It's just smaller than I expected. My kids loved it though.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson loves it! His twin got The Black Panther and his older brother got Spider-Man.

customer_reviews.title: Nice

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! It's great quality and looks great up on the wall!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get much better than this!

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Good product. Still up as I review today.

customer_reviews.title: Happy 3 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves his Spiderman decal for his room.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing the kids really loved the lifelike look of the character

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice on the wall. Does not look like a decal.
customer_reviews.author: Terez Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and my 5 y/o Groot obsessed son loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to have Spider-Man on his wall. This was easy to install. Unlike the other wall decal we have this one is easy to apply because you can stick it to the wall and reposition it. It does come in piece that you have to put together like a puzzle. At first I was annoyed, but it’s actually better that was. This is a must have for the Spider-Man enthusiast in your life. The smaller decals were a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Boddiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall decor
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a show stopper, my 5 yr old son went crazy. He helped me place this up and we added the app for the come alive graphics! Best Buy decision ever! He invites everyone to see this even via FaceTime lol
customer_reviews.author: CustomerT

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for a boys room ever!
customer_reviews.text: The look on my sons face was PRICELESS! There is nothing he loves more than Black Panther! As soon as this arrived, I set it up and waited patiently for my son to get home from school! He thought it was awesome before he saw it come to life, aww the little things! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up on wall
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for my sons walk not too big not too small - easy to put up just read directions carefully and you have to align the legs would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: AmazinFinder

customer_reviews.title: Huge hulk looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this decal. It’s huge. And your phone can “activate” it and it comes to life which is pretty cool. It’s excellent quality. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Travelfamily

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy with the hulk on his wall.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves the hulk, so he was happy with seeing this decal on his wall. Easier to get off paper with nails and 2 people. Not easy to remove from wall, tinds to rip. Pretty simple to apply on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that you can reapply it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my son's room. He was so excited. It is a great size at 20" x 28" and is high quality. I love that you can reposition it or even reapply it over and over. Definitely a plus. Now he wants them all. Will definitely be purchasing more in the future for his superhero room.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I expected. My son said that he's going to lose because he's too small.
customer_reviews.author: kampy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, easy to stick together and remove.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Easy to to apply and also easy to remove if you want it in another place.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to superhero bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply to the wall! My son was so surprised when he came home and saw the addition to his super hero bedroom! He absolutely loves it and it looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and great price
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this superhero, installation was very easy and the price was very reasonable. No fuss, no mess.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. I used it to make props for my son’s birthday party. Kinda difficult to assemble. I wish it came in one or two pieces

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the butt to put up
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt to put together. Really hard to get some of the parts to line up. But once that's done and it's up, it looks really cool.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old, loves spiderman. He shows off his room to all his friends and family. It's the perfect size on his wall. It's about the size of a 3 year old toddler. Nice compliment to room wall. Stick's to wall very well. Bright in color

product_meta.title: Marvel Spider-Man Wall Decal - Spider-Man Wall Decals with 3D Augmented Reality Interaction - Marvel Room Decor Marvel Wall Decals
feature_bullets: MORE THAN SPIDER-MAN DECOR - Decorate his room and watch his fascination as the Spider-Man decal swings to life on your phone or tablet! Wall Palz is innovating wall decals by bringing decor and entertainment together with Augmented Reality.

EASY TO APPLY AND PEEL OFF - Put the Spider-Man decal anywhere you want knowing it is safe for all surfaces! The decals firmly stick to the wall, and are easy to peel off without leaving any sticky residue.

CREATE A SPIDER-MAN THEMED ROOM IN MINUTES - Apply the wall stickers to a bedroom, nursery, playroom or bathroom to create a superhero themed room. The large Spider-Man decal measures 30 inches tall when assembled on the wall.

HIGH QUALITY MARVEL VINYL DECAL - Wall Palz by Decalcomania uses only the highest quality vinyl that sticks to any smooth surface without damage. The Spider-Man wall stickers are proudly made in the USA.
PERFECT HOLIDAY OR BIRTHDAY GIFT - Surprise the super hero in your life with a magical gift that is parent approved!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars635 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
